channel.title: Articles on CSEP
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on CSEP

item.title: Signature of the education sponsorship
item.author: antoine.tavant@polytechnique.edu (Antoine Tavant)
item.description: Growth of spatial engineering at the Ecole Polytechnique If the CSEP has been training polytechnic students in spatial engineering for almost 10 years, it is only within the framework of its projects.

item.title: IonSat is recruiting !
item.author: antoine.tavant@polytechnique.edu (Antoine Tavant)
item.description: Take the direction of a satellite Ionsat is a 6U nanosatellite equipped with an electric propulsion engine, dedicated to demonstrating the feasibility of nanosatellite missions in very low orbit (250km).
